backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor indicating no backend logic is required for custom domain integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing custom-domain setup and canonical URL metadata features with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries describing each frontend file’s role in styling, components, documentation, and domain setup.
frontend/docs/custom-domain-setup.md: Step‑by‑step guide for configuring DNS and registering a custom domain with Internet Computer boundary nodes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file containing an empty canonical link tag and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and setup guide for the React‑based frontend showcasing the solar power project.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing all major site sections and layout.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section featuring company highlights, mission, and supporting content blocks.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section showing company info and a simple name/message form.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with solar-farm imagery, tagline, and scroll‑linked call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Project.tsx: Displays project stats, images, and highlights for the Madurai solar installation using a grid-based layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, contact details, and a powered-by attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Sustainability.t: Shows sustainability initiatives and environmental commitments with icon cards and a highlighted info section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with a solar-inspired color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including summary, architectural notes, features, and configuration for the Rithwik Indus Power website build.
